item.title: Asynchronous Federated Unlearning
item.description: Ningxin Su, Baochun Li, University of Toronto, IEEE International Conference on Computer Communications (INFOCOM) 2023 [Paper] [Video] [Source Code] Thanks to regulatory policies such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), it is essential to provide users with the right to erasure regarding their own private data, even if such data has been used to train a neural network model.

Ningxin Su is currently a third-year Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Engineering group, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Toronto. She received her M.E. Degree and B.E. Degree from The University of Sheffield and Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2020 and 2019, respectively.
